name: ethcontract-contracts
description: Test contracts for ethcontract-rs runtime and proc macro.

scripts.deploy: npm run build && truffle migrate --reset --network rinkeby && node scripts/artifacts.js extract-networks
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run normalize
scripts.test: npm run build && truffle test && npm run normalize && git diff --exit-code HEAD

author: Nicholas Rodrigues Lordello <nlordell@gmail.com>
